mapper.select: SELECT c.C_ID, c.SONG_ID, c.ID, c.C_TEXT, c.CREATED_TIME, c.MODIFIED_TIME, u.nickname FROM comments c JOIN users u ON c.ID = u.ID WHERE c.SONG_ID = #{songId}
mapper.insert: insert into comments (song_id, id, c_text) values (#{songId}, #{id}, #{cText})
mapper.update: update comments set c_text = #{cText} where c_id = #{cId}
